Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Rhino Tank
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
Amidst the grim battleground of GrimWorld 40,000, the Rhino Transport emerges as a stalwart workhorse. With its utilitarian yet robust design, this armored transport embodies the practical might of the Imperium in the unforgiving 41st millennium.

Clad in weathered plating and bearing the weight of Imperial iconography, the Rhino tells tales of unyielding service, a testament to its reliability in the ongoing war. Its no-nonsense aesthetic reflects the harsh and pragmatic nature of warfare within the Imperium.

Purpose-built for troop transport, the Rhino is a symbol of battlefield logistics. Its sturdy chassis ensures the safe deployment of Imperial forces, providing a mobile fortress in the face of relentless opposition.

As it traverses the war-scarred terrain, the Rhino Transport stands as a steadfast symbol of the Imperium's resilience, navigating the darkness of GrimWorld 40,000 with a determination to fulfill its crucial role in the Emperor's grand strategy. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passenger x10
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
